word: The Revelation was written to the seven churches of Asia, which represented the people of God throughout the world. "John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Grace be unto you, and peace, from Him which is, and which was, and which is to come: and from the seven Spirits which are before His throne; and from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth." Banished to the solitude of the Isle of Patmos, John was favored with the presence of Jesus Christ.
